summary: A former guerrilla is reluctantly drawn into the vengeance scheme of one of his victims.
cast: Edgar Ramírez|Ricardo Vélez|Carolina Gómez|Salvador del Solar|Patrick Forster-Delmas|María Luna Beltrán|Arnold Cantillo|Albi De Abreu|Laura Perico|Santiago Quintero|Simón Rivera|Andres Sandoval|Maria Utrilla|Juan Carlos Vargas|Ángela Vergara
title: Saluda al diablo de mi parte
